name: gemstep-token
description: GemStep Token project with Hardhat, upgradeable contracts, and full test suite.

scripts.test: cross-env-shell "set HARDHAT_NETWORK=& set BUILD_PROFILE=dev& set PRINT_BUILD=1& hardhat test"
scripts.test:fast: cross-env-shell "set HARDHAT_NETWORK=& set BUILD_PROFILE=dev& set OPTIMIZER_RUNS=50& set PRINT_BUILD=1& hardhat test"
scripts.test:prodnet: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat test --network sepolia
scripts.coverage: cross-env-shell "set HARDHAT_NETWORK=& set PRINT_BUILD=1& hardhat coverage"
scripts.compile:dev: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=dev OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat compile
scripts.compile:prod: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat compile
scripts.size:prod: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod SIZE_ONLY=GemStepToken PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat size-contracts
scripts.deploy: npm run check:config && npx hardhat deploy
scripts.deploy:win: npm run check:config & if %errorlevel% equ 0 (npx hardhat deploy)
scripts.deploy:local: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=dev PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:local:exec: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=dev PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network localhost --execute-accept
scripts.deploy:hardhat: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=dev PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network hardhat
scripts.deploy:hardhat:exec: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=dev PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network hardhat --execute-accept
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:sepolia:exec: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network sepolia --execute-accept
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-sepolia: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network arbitrumSepolia
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-sepolia:exec: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network arbitrumSepolia --execute-accept
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deployGemStepEnv.js --network arbitrum
scripts.deploy:legacy: cross-env BUILD_PROFILE=prod OPTIMIZER_RUNS=200 PRINT_BUILD=1 hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.test:gas: powershell -Command "$env:REPORT_GAS='true'; npx hardhat test | Tee-Object gas-report.txt"
scripts.upgrade:prepare: PREPARE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run scripts/upgrade-l2-crosschain-safe.js --network arbitrumSepolia
